name: Chicken Biryani
description: Authentic Abbottabad style biryani with long grain basmati rice and tender chicken.

name: Seekh Kabab
description: Succulent minced meat skewers charred to perfection on charcoal.

name: Chicken Karahi
description: Traditional spicy karahi cooked in a wok with fresh tomatoes and ginger.

name: Garlic Naan
description: Freshly baked clay oven bread topped with minced garlic and butter.

name: Chapli Burger
description: Peshawari style chapli kabab patty in a soft bun with traditional chutneys.

name: Masala Fries
description: Crispy fries tossed in our signature Lahori spice blend.

name: Lassi
description: Refreshing traditional yogurt-based drink, sweet or salty.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft milk-solid balls dipped in rose-scented sugar syrup.

name: Pakola
description: The national drink of Pakistan, distinct cream soda flavor.

name: Zinger Burger
description: Crispy fried chicken breast with mayo and lettuce.

name: Mutton Karahi
description: Tender mutton cooked in wok with black pepper and green chilies.

name: Kheer
description: Traditional rice pudding with cardamom and nuts.

name: Samosa Chaat
description: Crispy samosas served with chickpeas, yogurt and chutneys.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple decker sandwich with chicken, egg, cheese and veggies.
